findings.name: SQL Injection in Login Form
findings.description: SQL injection vulnerability detected in the username parameter of the login form.
findings.vuln_evidence: Payload: ' OR '1'='1 resulted in authentication bypass
findings.recommendation: Use parameterized queries to prevent SQL injection attacks.

findings.name: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
findings.description: Reflected XSS vulnerability in search parameter.
findings.recommendation: Sanitize and encode user input before rendering.
